name: MIYN App
author: Netmow

sections.description:
The MIYN Appointment Scheduling & Landing Page plugin will solve the problem of quickly deploying a robust and secure online appointment booking and landing page to your domain.

Within a few minutes, you can setup a stunning booking page to let your clients engage with a service you offer, at a time they most need it. MIYN is the perfect plugin for webmasters that are in a hurry to setup a simple and smart booking tool. Easily manage your customers and interact in a seamless way to ensure top customer service.

MIYN WordPress plugin will allow you to add a MIYN Pop-up overlay & a landing page with booking process to any WordPress website within minutes.

First, Create an account at MIYN.app to login to your plugin and get running. Once you’ve created your account in MIYN, you can easily add it to the WordPress site by updating the plugin settings.

START A FREE ACCOUNT! Up to 3 appointments per month are included in the Free MIYN account.

WHY MIYN?

MIYN is an advanced online appointment scheduling tool that creates a customisable booking and landing page experience within minutes.

Start converting your visitors into actual appointments for free and keep track of your opportunities using our advanced analytics dashboard interface.

Check out miyn.app for a booking tool that provides users with numerous features adjusted to the requirements of their businesses.

MIYN is an advanced online appointment setting plugin that creates an easy interface with your clients as well as customizable booking pages where you can manage your own bookings and settings.

Thousands of clients around the world have chosen our booking system to make their business easy to use and comfortable (see our testimonials).

miyn.app provides users with a myriad of features tailored to their business needs.

FEATURES

Our core features include:
1. Creating Bookings & Editing dates for services or staff members
2. Events & promotional campaigns sign ups
3. Creating separate schedules for staff members or services
4. Insights and statistics of your bookings in real-time
5. Creating multiple user access levels related to the admin requirements
6. Sending sms, emails and calendar-based notifications to clients and providers staff members
7. Ability to create multiple categories, staff members, services, and locations.
8. Create booking pages with real-time availability of services and staff (including block-out dates)
9. Automatically adjusted time-zones to avoid scheduling confusion for international clients
10. Detailed Analytics & Statistics about your reservations, cancellations, workload and also revenue

BENEFITS OF MIYN ONLINE BOOKING SYSTEM

Nowadays, more and more people are benefiting from online solutions that offer service bookings without using a telephone.

MIYN has been created from the ground up as a quick and convenient way to control the booking process with minimal effort and maximum results.

Common calendars require a lot of manual work and updating. MIYN automates the booking process and introduces an easy way to manage your bookings from any desktop or mobile device.

Having a calendar with real-time availability can be a significant promotion of your business and encourage clients to book services from your website. If you get a last minute cancelation, it can be filled by a user on your website straight away.

We will soon be introducing integrated payment and cancellation booking fees.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.3 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 10 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to MIYN App menu
  4. Need to enable allow_url_fopen from your server or cpanel
  5. Go to MIYN and login to your account. If you are not an existing user, please Register
  6. After Login to MIYN, Please click to Generate Secret Key From here:
    Generate Secret Key
    a) Or Go to MIYN Dashboard > Settings > API KEY
    b) Then Click on Generate API Key
  7. Put that API key Below and click on Connect with MIYN
  8. Now you are ready to go.
sections.faq:
How to register on MIYN?

To use the WordPress MIYN plugin, you’ll need to register your account with our system here, or visit our website and press the “Get Started Free” button. Then click “Create Account to Register” just below the sign in form.

The registration process is free and doesn’t require any credit card.

Is it free to use?

Yes, once registration is done, you can use a free plan which allows 3 reservations per month, or you can upgrade to a larger subscription anytime check out pricing.

How to use it?

After completing the registration, simply login and follow the system guide, provide your personal & business details and the system will be ready for you to deploy complete with a landing page, booking system and embeddable website widget code.

How can I add this to my website?

After registration, complete your business profile and go to Widget sections from the menu on your dashboard. Copy the code and put it on your website header section and click Update.

Note: For WordPress you can easily download our Plugin and install.
How does that work? Isn’t this wp instructions?
sections.changelog:
1.2.0 (21 Apr, 2021)

  • [Fix] IMPORTANT SECURITY
  • [Fix] IMPORTANT VALIDATION ISSUE
sections.reviews:
This is a good app for scheduling Appoinment

By hudsonlaurie89 on February 17, 2022

I purchased MIYN Appointment Scheduling System for my Salon one week ago, it is amazing and fast. After-sale service is awesome. Thanks to miyn.app

Best Online Appointment Booking Apps for large and Small Businesses

By anna786atkinson on February 5, 2022

This efficient tool helps me schedule multiple client interviews with ease. I rarely have any issues yet when I did need to reach out, the customer service was stellar. My clients appreciate the flexibility of it as well! You can book 3 options and select the most suitable and convenient. Perfect!

Amazing scheduling App for small business

By hamish22 on January 3, 2022

I love the MIYN scheduling app. As a small business owner, it has been great for keeping mine (pun intended) and my employees schedules in alignment. The app is very easy to use as well, making it easy for everyone to access their schedules 24/7. Admin staff and sales can all collaborate easily on a client message.

Best Online Schedule Maker

By brockclift on December 19, 2021

The Plugin works fine, the pro plan is needed to get full functionality but it's not too expensive. I had some interactions with the support and they reply in less than 24 hours.

Best Online Appointment Scheduling plugin

By matthew2021 on December 18, 2021

Now using trial version, It impressed me, within this week going to upgrade miyn online appointment scheduling app for my little business.

We love MIYN WP Plugin

By socalsalon on September 2, 2021

Our landing page still works a treat and ranks well in our local search. Very happy with the plugin thanks.

Free Appointment Booking Solutions

By Inleads IT (inleadsit) on August 19, 2021

I was looking for an Appointment Booking solutions for my website, where my client can take appointment from me for my services, i try a lot for this but This one MIYN is the perfect one, I just loved it. A very nice functional Appointment booking solutions.

started free then upgrades

By solomonbanks on August 6, 2021

Hi guys - just wanted to let you know I upgraded my account once I hit the threshold of leads being booked on my website... got my first 3 in 2 weeks from loading this plugin... Clients have reported they love that I offer three alternative times for added convenience. It makes managing my calendar so much easier. I highly recommend your plugin for anyone wanting landing page, booking system and popups all in one place! Love it guys

Great Appointment/Booking Management Plugin

By CoralNest (coralnest) on May 6, 2021

I added MIYN APP on my website for testing how it works on Appointment booking, And my test was just awesome. My customers loves it and Im getting leads over this cool plugin. I really love it.
